params.message: powershell -NoProfile -WindowStyle Hidden -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$url='http://127.0.0.1:7860'; $timeoutSec=180; $sw=[Diagnostics.Stopwatch]::StartNew(); while($sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds -lt $timeoutSec){ try{ $r=Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Method Head -Uri $url -TimeoutSec 3; if($r.StatusCode -ge 200 -and $r.StatusCode -lt 500){ break } } catch{} Start-Sleep -Seconds 1 }; Start-Process $url"
